channel.title: life on Blommaerts Edwin
channel.description: Recent content in life on Blommaerts Edwin

item.title: Almost the new year
item.description: Well, what a year this has been. My daughter turned six. I can’t believe how fast she’s growing. I can still vividly remember being able to hold her in one arm, the palm of my hand cradling her little head. Now she’s putting on children’s makeup and talking about boys that kissed her. I’m now also single. I didn’t see that one coming at the start of the year, but here we are.
